title: GRID Autosport v1.0.103.1840 + DLCs + LAN (no-Steam)
description:
================================================================================
GRID Autosport + DLCs L.A.N. working! Just install & play.
================================================================================

English/Spanish


================================================================================
About this Jimbus edition:
================================================================================

- Custom installer highly compressed.
- The game is updated and with all its DLCs, but some videos and every language but English and Spanish have been
deleted to be able to make a DVD9. However, the gameplay is untouched.
- Multiplayer works in L.A.N. without having to use Steam.


================================================================================
Instructions:
================================================================================

1. Run setup.exe file to install the game.
2. Use the shortcuts the installer creates.
3. Always start the game from "SmartSteamloader.exe".


================================================================================
FAQ:
================================================================================

Q: Does the multiplayer work?
A: Yes, in local area network, either physical or using Evolve, Tunngle, Hamachi or similar.

Q: Do I need Steam to play?
A: No.

Q: What DLCs are included?
A: All of them.

Q: Does it work under Windows 10?
A: Yes, it does. 


This is not an update but the full game. Do not install it over an existing installation
